statements: SELECT * FROM humidity_data
SELECT sensor_id, greenhouse_id FROM humidity_data
SELECT sensor_id, humidity FROM humidity_data WHERE greenhouse_id = 1
SELECT * FROM humidity_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM humidity_data
SELECT sensor_id, greenhouse_id, humidity, timestamp FROM humidity_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM humidity_data WHERE greenhouse_id = 2 ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM humidity_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY avg_humidity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT greenhouse_id FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity > 70
SELECT * FROM humidity_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM humidity_data WHERE sensor_id = '1234'
SELECT greenhouse_id, temperature FROM greenhouse WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT AVG(humidity_percentage) as average_humidity FROM humidity_data GROUP BY greenhouse_id
SELECT * FROM greenhouse ORDER BY last_inspection DESC
SELECT MAX(temperature) as max_temperature FROM greenhouse WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM humidity_data WHERE sensor_id = '5836b1f3-4f12-4b5c-aa5c-35b882db9a4f';
SELECT humidity_percentage, timestamp FROM humidity_data WHERE greenhouse_id = '8c4e7c5f-4270-4a76-95df-a8c5fbd3af06';
SELECT sensor_id, greenhouse_id, MAX(humidity_percentage) AS max_humidity FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity_percentage < 70 GROUP BY sensor_id, greenhouse_id;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity_threshold < 60;
SELECT greenhouse_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM humidity_data GROUP BY greenhouse_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM greenhouse_sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM plant_species WHERE optimal_humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, humidity FROM sensor_readings WHERE temperature < 25;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, humidity_level FROM greenhouse_sensors WHERE humidity_level > 50;
SELECT plant_species.species_name, sensor_readings.timestamp, sensor_readings.humidity FROM plant_species JOIN sensor_readings ON plant_species.species_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, location, temperature FROM greenhouse_sensors WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM humidity_sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type FROM humidity_sensors WHERE humidity_value > 80;
SELECT greenhouse_name, location, capacity FROM greenhouses ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT species_name, optimal_humidity, optimal_temperature FROM plant_species WHERE optimal_temperature < 25;
SELECT reading_id, reading_time, humidity_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM humidity_sensors WHERE humidity_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_location DESC;
SELECT greenhouse_name, location FROM greenhouses WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT species_name, optimal_humidity, optimal_temperature FROM plant_species WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY optimal_humidity ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, humidity_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE humidity_value BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY reading_time DESC;

SELECT * FROM plant_growth INNER JOIN greenhouses ON plant_growth.greenhouse_id = greenhouses.greenhouse_id INNER JOIN plant_species ON plant_growth.species_id = plant_species.species_id WHERE reading_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT greenhouse_id, humidity, temperature FROM greenhouse_sensors WHERE humidity > 50 AND temperature < 30
SELECT sensor_id, greenhouse_id, timestamp FROM greenhouse_sensors WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM greenhouse_sensors WHERE temperature >= 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM greenhouses WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM greenhouse_sensors WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM greenhouses WHERE max_capacity < 50;
SELECT plant_name, optimal_humidity_range ->> 'min' AS min_humidity FROM plants WHERE plant_id = '7f9c84c8-7573-474e-a5fe-0c9b3c784ae3';
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, s.temperature, s.humidity FROM users u JOIN sensor_logs s ON u.user_id = s.sensor_id WHERE s.timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.timestamp ASC;
